trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around February 1st 2010
Summary: Fast moving, four lights forming into one the vanishing.
divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was on my way home from basketball I looked out the window to see these four large lights. There were four other people in the car with me I informed one of my friends of sighting. He looked out his window and saw the UFO also. My feelings toward the sighting was shock and a happy feeling. I lost sight of the object when it sped up and vanished into nothing. If any one has heard or seen any thing about this ufo contact me at (Blaisebb@hotmail.com)
